metadata.name: HashStones | Blue Dream
metadata.description:
Name: Blue Dream  
Material: .925 Sterling Silver  
Gemstones: Blue Topaz  
Diamonds: 22  
Occasion: Semi-Formal Dinner  
Delivery time: 2 Weeks

After purchase, we will set a date for all genesis holders to redeem the physical ring. After that all images will change to an NFT of that Jewelry to be used within the metaverse.

Who are we?: We may not make the most unique designs, but we have an eye for quality. We are a group of Crypto-enthusiasts, Gemstone lovers and Jewelry designers from Bangkok.  We are making Jewelry by Crypto-enthusiasts for Crypto-enthusiasts. Support our Web3 Jewelry shop to support decentralization. We have been working for 30+ years in the Gemstone & Jewelry industry and we are now extremely excited about the future of Web3 and its function within the physical goods space.

Have a custom request: DM our twitter regarding custom requests, please note that we only work on very high valued & special pieces for custom requests.

Links:  
Website: HashStones.com  
Twitter: Twitter.com/hashstones  
Discord: Discord.gg/ZqhH4Yer
